nodes.bodyText: Can we make this a little bit clearer? Some UIConfigs inherit fields, but don't defined any.
Could we make it a final method that checks if createFields() is not empty?
I wanted to avoid creating the fields just to throw them away and not use them.
I feel our code is more bug prone if hard code true and false. If a user changes one method they have to remember the other one exists and maybe change it accordingly.
Can we put all methods that return streams on their own line here?
Moving this stream to line 77.5 will allow you to have only the original if statement as streaming over an empty list will hardly have an impact to begin with.
Since this is just a boolean, should we have it passed through the constructor and remove abstract from this method?
